definitions.body: fulness of hand (= handful) Ec 4:6, Ec 4:6 sq. acc. mat. [[חָפְנֵיכֶם פִּיחַ]] ´[[מ]] Ex 9:8 cf. Le 16:12, 1Ki 17:12; so homer-full of manna; Ex 16:33 cf. Le 16:12, Nu 22:18, Nu 24:13, Ju Jdg 6:38; simil. [[מְלאׁ בְגְדוֹ]] 2Ki 4:39; rarely sq. [[מִן]] Le 2:2, Le 5:12, cf. Ex 16:32 (but rd. perh. [[מִלְאוּ]] so LXX Sam. v. Di).
mass of shepherds Is 31:4 (in sim); multitude of nations Ge 48:19 (cf. Ar. mala0’a Qor 2:247 al.)

fullness = that which fills, entire contents, of [[אֶדֶץ]] De 33:16, Ps 24:1, Is 6:3, Is 8:8, Is 34:1, Mic 1:2, Je 8:16, Je 47:2, Ez Eze 12:19, Eze 19:7, Eze 30:12, Eze 32:15; [[תֵּבֵל]] Ps 50:12, Ps 89:12; [[יׇם]] Is 42:10, 1Ch 16:32, Ps 96:11, Ps 98:7; [[עִיר]] Am 6:8.
phrases:—[[קוֹמָתוֹ]] ´[[מ]] = at full length 1Sa 28:20; full line, or portion [[הַחֶ֫בַל]] ´[[מ]] 2Sa 8:2; [[הַקָּנֶה]] ´[[מ]] Ez Eze 41:8 full rod (reed).
